title: geocorr-api R Package
text: R package provides simplified programmatic access geographic crosswalks geocorr2022 website (https://mcdc.missouri.edu/applications/geocorr2022.html). allows users obtain geographic correspondence tables different geographic units (e.g., census tracts ZIP codes, counties congressional districts) without manually using web interface.

title: geocorr-api R Package
text: Simplified programmatic access geocorr2022 geographic crosswalks Support various geographic unit combinations Automated data retrieval processing Always returns crosswalks 50 states (state subsetting) Consistent data frame output format complex filtering options - focuses core crosswalk functionality

title: geocorr-api R Package
text: Use tools rvest package dynamically interact geocorr22 website submit request crosswalk Use tools rvest package download requested website available geocorr22 Standardize returned crosswalk users always returned crosswalk column names, regardless geographies crosswalked Simplify geocorr2022 interface removing complex options always requesting nationwide data

title: geocorr-api R Package
text: state selection: Always returns crosswalks 50 states Single output format: Always returns R data frame (CSV, HTML, PDF options) geographic filters: Removes optional county codes, metro area codes, filtering options Core functionality : Focuses essential crosswalk generation without advanced customization

title: geocorr-api R Package
text: Follow R package development best practices Use roxygen2 documentation Include comprehensive examples function documentation Ensure proper error handling API interactions Write unit tests public functions Consider rate limiting web requests

title: geocorr-api R Package
text: Run devtools::test() execute unit tests Use devtools::check() submitting changes Test various geographic unit combinations

title: geocorr-api R Package
text: Tidyverse packages: dplyr, stringr, purrr, tibble API packages: httr2, jsonlite Web scraping: rvest Development tools: devtools, testthat, roxygen2

title: geocorr-api R Package
text: Always prefer tidyverse packages base R equivalents Use stringr functions instead base R string functions (never use grepl, gsub, regexpr, etc.) Use dplyr data manipulation instead base R Use purrr functional programming instead apply family functions Use tibble instead data.frame possible Follow tidyverse style conventions pipe operators

title: Authors and Citation
text: Curran-Groome. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Curran-Groome W (2025). crosswalk: Standardized inter-temporal inter-geography crosswalks. R package version 0.1.0, https://ui-research.github.io/crosswalk/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {crosswalk: Standardized inter-temporal and inter-geography crosswalks},   author = {Will Curran-Groome},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.1.0},   url = {https://ui-research.github.io/crosswalk/}, }

title: Standardized inter-temporal and inter-geography crosswalks
text: R interface inter-geography inter-temporal crosswalking.

title: Standardized inter-temporal and inter-geography crosswalks
text: project provides consistent API standardized versions crosswalks allow programmatic interpolation time geographies. Say goodbye manual crosswalk downloads say hello reproducible workflows.

title: Standardized inter-temporal and inter-geography crosswalks
text: get started geocorr-api:
code: # Load the package library(crosswalk)  place_county_crosswalk = get_geocorr_crosswalk(   source_geography = "place",   target_geography = "county",   weight = c("population"),   cache = here::here("data"))

title: Obtain a Geocorr22 Crosswalk — get_geocorr_crosswalk
text: Query Geocorr22 (https://mcdc.missouri.edu/applications/geocorr2022.html) crosswalk two geographies 51 states Puerto Rico.

title: Obtain a Geocorr22 Crosswalk — get_geocorr_crosswalk
code: get_geocorr_crosswalk(   source_geography,   target_geography,   weight = c("population", "housing", "land"),   cache = NULL,   overwrite_cache = FALSE )

title: Obtain a Geocorr22 Crosswalk — get_geocorr_crosswalk
text: source_geography Source geography type target_geography Target geography type weight Weighting variable. One c("population", "housing", "land"). cache NULL default. NULL, path cache results. overwrite_cache FALSE default. TRUE, existing cached crosswalk replaced.

title: Obtain a Geocorr22 Crosswalk — get_geocorr_crosswalk
text: dataframe representing requested Geocorr22 crosswalk 51 states Puerto Rico. Depending desired geographies, fields may included. state_fips two-digit identified state (DC/PR), applicable state_abbreviation two-character abbreviation state (DC/PR), applicable source_geoid unique identifier source geography target_geoid unique identifier target geography source_geography_name name source geography target_geography_name name target geography allocation_factor_source_to_target Source geography identifier (place FIPS code) allocation_factor_target_to_source Target geography identifier (county FIPS code) population_2020 estimated overlap population, applicable housing_2020 estimated overlap housing units, applicable land_area_sqmi overlap land area, applicable source_geography name source geography, e.g., "tract" source_geography name target geography, e.g., "place" weighting_factor attribute used calculate allocation factors (one population, housing, land)

title: Get NHGIS Geographic Crosswalk — get_nhgis_crosswalk
text: Retrieves geographic crosswalk IPUMS NHGIS API based user-specified source target geographies years. Accepts various spellings formats geography names.

title: Get NHGIS Geographic Crosswalk — get_nhgis_crosswalk
code: get_nhgis_crosswalk(   source_year,   source_geography,   target_year,   target_geography,   api_key = NULL )

title: Get NHGIS Geographic Crosswalk — get_nhgis_crosswalk
text: source_year Character numeric. Year source geography one c(1990, 2000, 2010, 2020). source_geography Character. Source geography name. One c("block", "block group part", "tract"). target_year Character numeric. Year target geography, one c(1990, 2000, 2010, 2020). target_geography Character. Target geography name. One c("block", "block group part", "tract", "county"). api_key Character. NULL default, case function looks IPUMS_API_KEY environment variable.

title: Get NHGIS Geographic Crosswalk — get_nhgis_crosswalk
text: data frame containing crosswalk specified geographies.

title: List Available NHGIS Crosswalks — list_nhgis_crosswalks
text: Returns data frame available NHGIS geographic crosswalks corresponding parameters can used get_nhgis_crosswalk().

title: List Available NHGIS Crosswalks — list_nhgis_crosswalks
text: data frame columns: source_year: Year source geography source_geography: Source geography name (standardized) target_year: Year target geography target_geography: Target geography name (standardized)

title: Standardize Geography Names — standardize_geography
text: Internal helper function convert various geography name spellings standard codes.

title: Standardize Geography Names — standardize_geography
text: geography Character. Geography name various formats. context Character. Either "source" "target" determine valid options.

title: Standardize Geography Names — standardize_geography
text: Character. Standardized geography code.
